name: Simone Kaho
bio: Simone Kaho is from New Zealand and of Tongan ancestry. She earned her MA in creative writing from the International Institute of Modern Letters. Her poetry has been published in journals such as JAAM, Turbine, and The Dominion Post. A noted performance poet and former member of Literrati, she has appeared in shows such as The Kerouac Effect, Poetry Live, and spit.it.out.
